items.utility: Grand Valley Rrl Pwr Line, Inc
items.name: Time of Use - Farm and Home: Schedule TOU-1
items.description:
Time of Use - Farm and Home
Schedule -TOU-1

* Available to customers qualifying for service under Farm and Home Service, Schedule FH-1, and Irrigation Service, Schedule I-1. Subject to the established rules and regulations of the Seller.
Note: See reference website for additional Time of Use Rate details.

* Assume Net Metering= due to Photovoltaic Interconnection Service (Schedule PV-I).

* The Power Cost Adjustment (PCA) shall be applied to customers in all rate schedules and classes.  The PCA shall be adjusted to the most current billing period, as information is available from the Utilities wholesale provider(s).  The PCA adjustment shall appear on the consumers billing statement following the billing period of the Fuel Cost Factor (FCA) adjustment for wholesale power cost by the wholesale provider(s). 

* The Power Cost Adjustment per customer shall be calculated each billing period based on wholesale power bills as follows: PCA = (FCA/total system kilowatt-hours sold) x total number of individual customer's kilowatt-hours billed.
items.energycomments:
In addition to the rates and charges described above, a Wholesale Power Cost
Adjustment (WPCA) shall be applied to all kWh billed. The Wholesale Power Cost Adjustment (WPCA) shall be computed each month as
follows:
Power Cost Pass Through - 0.07148 = Wholesale Power Cost Adjustment
